name: file-nesting
description: Auto updating for Anthony's file nesting config

fileNestingUpdater.autoUpdate.description: Fetch and update the latest config automatically

fileNestingUpdater.promptOnAutoUpdate.description: Should show up the prompt before doing auto update

fileNestingUpdater.autoUpdateInterval.description: The minimal interval for auto update, in minutes

fileNestingUpdater.upstreamRepo.description: The upstream repo you want to update from

fileNestingUpdater.upstreamBranch.description: The branch name of upstream repo

fileNestingUpdater.whitelist.description: List of file nesting keys to include. Leave empty to include all
